title: Integrative medicine: a holistic approach to health
description: Find out how integrative medicine is used to improve your physical, mental and spiritual health.
cleaned_text: integrative medicine medicine can be an excellent tool for sustaining good health, as well medicine which refers to an approach to healing that is used in health and healing. The are some of key principles of medicine: - A strong partnership between patient physician Use of both conventional and alternative medicines and modalities - A focus on treatments when medicine to promote health and help relieve pain, well-being. And, many healthcare providers themselves use integrative approaches for their own of the distinct health and wellness benefits. Common health approaches used in integrative medicine - Deep breathing - Yoga - Tai chi or qi gong - Meditation - Massage - Functional nutrition - Homeopathy - Guided imagery Want to learn more about integrative medicine?
